metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The HTTP/2 protocol allows a denial of service (server resourceconsumption) because request cancellation can reset many streams quickly,as exploited in the wild in August through October 2023.

criterions.comment: haproxy: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
trafficserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
golang: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
golang-1.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
golang-1.10 package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
nodejs package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
